posts.post_title: The Photographic Cards of Goodwin & CO Book
posts.post_content:
This book by Jay Miller, Joe Gonsowski and Richard Masson is in like new condition. Has the Dust cover and basically I read the book when I got it. Great condition. Will send by Priority Mail for $65.

First one to PM or email me gets it.


*SOLD*
